parameters.name: Category
parameters.description:
The RDS edition of the instance. Valid values:

*   **Basic**: RDS Basic Edition
*   **HighAvailability**: RDS High-availability Edition
*   **cluster**: RDS Cluster Edition
*   **serverless_basic**: RDS Serverless Basic Edition

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request. You can use the client to generate the token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: ConnectionMode
parameters.description:
The connection mode of the instance. Valid values:

*   **Standard**: standard mode
*   **Safe**: database proxy mode

By default, this operation queries the instances that use any of the supported connection modes.

parameters.name: ConnectionString
parameters.description: The endpoint of the instance. You must specify this parameter only when you want to query a single instance.

parameters.name: DBInstanceClass
parameters.description: The instance type of the instance. For information, see [Primary ApsaraDB RDS instance types](~~26312~~).

parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description: The instance ID.

parameters.name: DBInstanceStatus
parameters.description: The status of the instance. For more information, see [Instance states](~~26315~~).

parameters.name: DBInstanceType
parameters.description:
The role of the instance. Valid values:

*   **Primary**: primary instance
*   **Readonly**: read-only instance
*   **Guard**: disaster recovery instance
*   **Temp**: temporary instance

By default, this operation returns the instances that assume any of the supported roles.

parameters.name: DedicatedHostGroupId
parameters.description: The dedicated cluster ID.

parameters.name: DedicatedHostId
parameters.description: The host ID of the instance in the dedicated cluster.

parameters.name: Engine
parameters.description:
The database engine of the instance. Valid values:

*   **MySQL**
*   **SQLServer**
*   **PostgreSQL**
*   **MariaDB**

By default, this operation returns the instances that run any of the supported database engines.

parameters.name: EngineVersion
parameters.description: The database engine version.

parameters.name: Expired
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to query instances that have expired. Valid values:

*   **True**: queries instances that have expired.
*   **False**: does not query instances that have expired.

parameters.name: Filter
parameters.description: The JSON string that consists of filter condition parameters and their values.

parameters.name: InstanceLevel
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to return the RDS edition of the instance by using the Category parameter. Valid values:

*   **0**: returns the RDS edition of the instance.
*   **1**: does not return the RDS edition of the instance.

parameters.name: InstanceNetworkType
parameters.description:
The network type of the instance. Valid values:

*   **VPC**
*   **Classic**

By default, this operation returns the instances that reside in any of the supported network types.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return per page. Valid values: **1 to 100**.

Default value: **30**.

> If you specify this parameter, **PageSize** and **PageNumber** are unavailable.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description: The token that is used to display the next page. You must set this parameter to the value that is returned from the most recent call of the **DescribeDBInstances** operation for **NextToken**. If the returned entries are displayed on multiple pages, the next page can be displayed when you call this operation again with this parameter specified.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description:
The page number. Valid values: any non-zero positive integer.

Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description:
The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: **1** to **100**.

Default value: **30**.

parameters.name: PayType
parameters.description:
The billing method of the instance. Valid values:

*   **Postpaid**: pay-as-you-go
*   **Prepaid**: subscription

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The region ID. You can call the DescribeRegions operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: SearchKey
parameters.description: The keyword that is used for fuzzy search. The keyword can be part of an instance ID or an instance description.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tag that is added to the instance. Each tag is a key-value pair that consists of two fields: TagKey and TagValue. You can specify a maximum of five tags in the following format for each request: {"key1":"value1","key2":"value2"...}.

parameters.name: VSwitchId
parameters.description: The vSwitch ID.

parameters.name: VpcId
parameters.description: The VPC ID.

parameters.name: ZoneId
parameters.description: The zone ID of the instance.

parameters.name: proxyId
parameters.description: A deprecated parameter. You do not need to configure this parameter.
